docs.snippet: Shipments of gold consigned to various banking houses arrived in New York yesterday on several vessels. The Lamport  Holt liner Vauban brouht from Uruguay a consignment of United States coin valued at more than $1,000,000. Other ships came from South...
docs.lead_paragraph: Shipments of gold consigned to various banking houses arrived in New York yesterday on several vessels. The Lamport Holt liner Vauban brouht from Uruguay a consignment of United States coin valued at more than $1,000,000. Other ships came from South America, Mexico, Southampton, Havre and Rotterdam.

headline.main: MORE GOLD COMES FROM 2 CONTINENTS; Liner Arrives From South America With $1,000,000 InUnited States Coin.BULLION, TOO, FROM EUROPE Seven Cases of Minted Silver Partof Consignment FromMexico.

docs.snippet: There was no change in the general situation on the Stock Exchange yesterday, business being mainly confined to professional operations, with the familiar declines in "industrial specialties "repeated. The railroad shares sold off fractionally....
docs.lead_paragraph: There was no change in the general situation on the Stock Exchange yesterday, business being mainly confined to professional operations, with the familiar declines in "industrial specialties "repeated. The railroad shares sold off fractionally. Heaviness in the oil shares was the outstanding feature yesterday.

headline.main: TOPICS IN WALL STREET.; Market Conditions Unchanged.

headline.main: URUGUAY TO GET $7,500,000; Syndicate of New York Banks Sign Contract for Loan.
OFFERS URUGUAY BONDS.; Lisman & Co. Selling Sinking Fund Issue Yielding 8.9%.

docs.snippet: The word's wheat production for 1921, according to incomplete returns of the Department of Agriculture, will approximate 1,975,000,000 bushels.
docs.lead_paragraph: The word's wheat production for 1921, according to incomplete returns of the Department of Agriculture, will approximate 1,975,000,000 bushels.

headline.main: WHEAT CROP NORMAL.; World's Production Officially Forecast at 1,975,000,000 Bushels.

headline.main: CEMENT NOTES OFFERED.; Issue of $1,500,000 Yielding 8.25 Per-Cent. Priced at 99.

docs.snippet: Gold valued at approximately $7,500,000, which arrived at this port over the week-end, was transferred yesterday to banking vaults, whence it will find its way to the Assay Office. Most of the bullion and coin came from India and England, and some of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Gold valued at approximately $7,500,000, which arrived at this port over the week-end, was transferred yesterday to banking vaults, whence it will find its way to the Assay Office. Most of the bullion and coin came from India and England, and some of it from the tropics.

headline.main: $7,500,000 IN GOLD IMPORTS FOR BANKS; Most of Bullion and Coin Came From India and England. STILL MORE ON THE WAY Cedric Bringing $2,685,000 for Kuhn, Loeb & Co., Making $102,290,000 for Them Since Jan. 1.
